'''Coruscating Potential''' is a part of Prepare for Tournament in the [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]] event.

On the event screen, it is represented by the [[File:Fabulous Fungus Frenzy Coruscating Potential.png|25x25px]] icon.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Coruscating Potential 1.png
|text1    = During the Coruscating Potential challenge, you must use Floral Jellies to form blends that your Fungi enjoy. Once they have absorbed them, they will awaken their potential.
|image2   = Tutorial Coruscating Potential 2.png
|text2    = Use Switch to exchange the positions of two adjacent Floral Jellies.
|image3   = Tutorial Coruscating Potential 3.png
|text3    = Use Rotate to shift the positions of 4 Floral Jellies once in a clockwise direction.
}}

==Awakened Descriptions==
{| class=wikitable style="width:60%"
! Fungus !! Awakened Description
|-
|{{Card|Floating Hydro Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|text=<small>Bongo-Head</small>|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon Healing.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Floating Hydro Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. It is very good at healing its allies and imprisoning opponents &mdash; a rather unfamiliar style of combat as far as you and Paimon are concerned.
|-
|{{Card|Stretchy Electro Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon Stamina Up.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Stretchy Electro Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. It can attack opponents from afar using Electro and increase the damage output of its party members.
|-
|{{Card|Stretchy Geo Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon DEF Up.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Stretchy Geo Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. It leans towards melee combat and uses powerful attacks to crush the opposing line.
|-
|{{Card|Whirling Cryo Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon DMG Up.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Whirling Cryo Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. Its unique technique is to close with its opponents very quickly, then unleash strong attacks to interrupt opposing moves.
|-
|{{Card|Floating Dendro Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon DMG Up.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Floating Dendro Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. It specializes in dealing with a single target, and can both attack from long range and heal its teammates.
|-
|{{Card|Stretchy Pyro Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon DMG Up.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Stretchy Pyro Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. It specializes in closing the distance and using a constant stream of fire to grill its opponents.
|-
|{{Card|Floating Anemo Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon Stamina Up.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Floating Anemo Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. It can use mysterious Anemo techniques to attract and pull opponents in a certain area.
|-
|{{Card|Whirling Pyro Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon DEF Up.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Whirling Pyro Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. Its behavior in battle is akin to a bomb packed with extra powder that can suppress nearby opponents brutally. It has the ability to gather and lower its opponents' resistances.
|-
|{{Card|Whirling Electro Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon DMG Up.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Whirling Electro Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. Swiftly closing gaps to perform frequent Electro-DMG-dealing attacks and then leaving its opponent's attack range &mdash; that's this creature's combat style.
|-
|{{Card|Stretchy Anemo Fungus|type=Fabulous Fungus Frenzy|suffix=Awakened Icon|nolink=1|icon=[[File:Icon Healing.png|25px|link=]]}}
|A Stretchy Anemo Fungus that has had its elemental potential awakened. It leans towards attacking foes at medium range, and it can also clear harmful elements.
|}
